name: Aadyaa Incense Sticks
description: Aadya incense sticks made to perfection with a blend of essential oil herbs and wood poeders. This treasured art of creating incense in handed down through generations and is suited for use in homes, workplaces ans in temples. light aadya incense to purify your surrounding and create a pleasant atmosphere. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
